data.actual_result: You aren't able to back of the modal with your phone's native back button
data.expected_result: You are able to back out of the modal
data.short_description: You cant back out of the "Turn off customization?" modal with your phone's native back button
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to your Privacy & Safety Settings - Try to disable the "Use data to customize my Discord experience" or "Use data to improve Discord" option - When the modal pops up, try and back out of the modal with your phone's native home button
